verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֞ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var The word אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu that came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, from the LORD אַחַ֣ר׀ <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char after שַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> shal-Lach had let him go אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, נְבוּזַרְאֲדָ֛ן <S%H5018><s%> ne-vu-zar-'a-Dan that Nebuzaradan רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> rav- the captain טַבָּחִ֖ים <S%H2876><s%> tab-ba-Chim of the guard מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָֽרָמָ֑ה <S%H7414><s%> ha-ra-Mah; from Ramah בְּקַחְתּ֣וֹ <S%H3947><s%> be-kach-To when he had taken אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> ve-hu- him אָס֤וּר <S%H631><s%> 'a-Sur him being bound בָּֽאזִקִּים֙ <S%H246><s%> ba-zik-Kim in chains בְּת֨וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch among כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all גָּל֤וּת <S%H1546><s%> ga-Lut all that were carried away captive יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem וִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah, and Judah הַמֻּגְלִ֖ים <S%H1540><s%> ham-mug-Lim which were carried away captive בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> ba-Ve-lah. unto Babylon

וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> rav- And the captain טַבָּחִ֖ים <S%H2876><s%> tab-ba-Chim of the guard לְיִרְמְיָ֑הוּ <S%H3414><s%> le-yir-me-Ya-hu; Jeremiah וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, against יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto him The LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God דִּבֶּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber hath pronounced אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָרָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah this evil הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, likewise אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom upon this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this

וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve hath brought וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as [it] and done יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Now the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he דִּבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber; according as he hath said כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because חֲטָאתֶ֤ם <S%H2398><s%> cha-ta-Tem because ye have sinned לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh against the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and did not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֣ם <S%H8085><s%> she-ma'-Tem and have not obeyed בְּקוֹל֔וֹ <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Lo, his voice וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah has happened לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem ; דָּבָר da-var כהַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var act קהַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this

וְעַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold פִתַּחְתִּ֣יךָ <S%H6605><s%> fit-tach-Ti-cha And now behold I loose הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, thee this day מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָאזִקִּים֮ <S%H246><s%> ha-zik-Kim from the chains אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- after יָדֶךָ֒ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha which [were] upon thine hand אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If ט֨וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov good בְּעֵינֶ֜יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha affliction לָב֧וֹא <S%H935><s%> la-Vo unto thee to come אִתִּ֣י <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ti for בָבֶ֗ל <S%H894><s%> va-Vel, with me into Babylon בֹּ֚א <S%H935><s%> bo come וְאָשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> ve-'a-Sim appoint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵינִי֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Ni affliction עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha, after וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if רַ֧ע <S%H7489><s%> ra' afflict בְּעֵינֶ֛יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha affliction לָבֽוֹא־ <S%H935><s%> la-Vo- unto thee to come אִתִּ֥י <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ti for בָבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> va-Vel with me into Babylon חֲדָ֑ל <S%H2308><s%> cha-Dal; forbear רְאֵה֙ <S%H7200><s%> re-'Eh behold כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz all the land לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha, [is] before אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- thee whither it seemeth ט֨וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov good וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to הַיָּשָׁ֧ר <S%H3477><s%> hai-ya-Shar right בְּעֵינֶ֛יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha affliction לָלֶ֥כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet go שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah wherever לֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> Lech. to go

וְעוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> ve-'o-Den-nu was still לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יָשׁ֗וּב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shuv, Now while he was not yet gone back וְשֻׁ֡בָה <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shu-vah [he said] Go back אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- then גְּדַלְיָ֣ה <S%H1436><s%> ge-dal-Yah also to Gedaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אֲחִיקָ֣ם <S%H296><s%> 'a-chi-Kam of Ahikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שָׁפָ֡ן <S%H8227><s%> sha-Fan of Shaphan אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הִפְקִ֨יד <S%H6485><s%> hif-Kid hath made governor מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- whom the king בָּבֶ֜ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> be-'a-Rei over the cities יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְשֵׁ֤ב <S%H3427><s%> ve-Shev and dwell אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> it-To for בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch with him among הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, the people א֠וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- anywhere הַיָּשָׁ֧ר <S%H3477><s%> hai-ya-Shar right בְּעֵינֶ֛יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha affliction לָלֶ֖כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet go לֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Lech; to go וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-ten- gave ל֧וֹ <S%H99999><s%> lo רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> rav- So the captain טַבָּחִ֛ים <S%H2876><s%> tab-ba-Chim of the guard אֲרֻחָ֥ה <S%H737><s%> 'a-ru-Chah him victuals וּמַשְׂאֵ֖ת <S%H4864><s%> u-mas-'Et and a reward וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7971><s%> Vay-shal-le-Che-hu. and let him go

וַיָּבֹ֧א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo Then went יִרְמְיָ֛הוּ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu Jeremiah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to גְּדַלְיָ֥ה <S%H1436><s%> ge-dal-Yah unto Gedaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אֲחִיקָ֖ם <S%H296><s%> 'a-chi-Kam of Ahikam הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <S%H4708><s%> ham-mitz-Pa-tah; to Mizpah וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev and dwelt אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> it-To for בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch with him among הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, the people הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֖ים <S%H7604><s%> han-nish-'a-Rim that were left בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. in the land ס sa-Mek

וַיִּשְׁמְעוּ֩ <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-me-'U heard כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol now all שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei Now when all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֜ים <S%H2428><s%> ha-cha-ya-Lim of the forces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בַּשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh, which [were] in the fields הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they וְאַנְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <S%H376><s%> ve-'an-shei-Hem, and their men כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הִפְקִ֧יד <S%H6485><s%> hif-Kid governor מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- that the king בָּבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גְּדַלְיָ֥הוּ <S%H1436><s%> ge-dal-Ya-hu had made Gedaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אֲחִיקָ֖ם <S%H296><s%> 'a-chi-Kam of Ahikam בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz; in the land וְכִ֣י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ve-Chi for הִפְקִ֣יד <S%H6485><s%> hif-Kid and had committed אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To, for אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim of the men וְנָשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> ve-na-Shim and women וָטָ֔ף <S%H2945><s%> va-Taf, and children וּמִדַּלַּ֣ת <S%H1803><s%> u-mid-dal-Lat and of the poor הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the land מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> me-'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- had not הָגְל֖וּ <S%H1540><s%> ha-ge-Lu of them that were not carried away captive בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> ba-Ve-lah. to Babylon

וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u Then they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to גְּדַלְיָ֖ה <S%H1436><s%> ge-dal-Yah to Gedaliah הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <S%H4708><s%> ham-mitz-Pa-tah; to Mizpah וְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <S%H3458><s%> ve-yish-ma-'El even Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נְתַנְיָ֡הוּ <S%H5418><s%> ne-tan-Ya-hu of Nethaniah וְיוֹחָנָ֣ן <S%H3110><s%> ve-yo-cha-Nan and Johanan וְיוֹנָתָ֣ן <S%H3129><s%> ve-yo-na-Tan and Jonathan בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- the sons קָ֠רֵחַ <S%H7143><s%> Ka-re-ach of Kareah וּשְׂרָיָ֨ה <S%H8304><s%> u-se-ra-Yah and Seraiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son תַּנְחֻ֜מֶת <S%H8576><s%> tan-Chu-met of Tanhumeth וּבְנֵ֣י׀ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the sons; עֹופַי 'o-fai כעֵיפַ֣י <S%H5778><s%> 'ei-Fai Ephai קהַנְּטֹפָתִ֗י <S%H5200><s%> han-ne-to-fa-Ti, the Netophathite וִֽיזַנְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3153><s%> vi-zan-Ya-hu and Jezaniah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הַמַּ֣עֲכָתִ֔י <S%H4602><s%> ham-Ma-'a-cha-Ti, of a Maachathite הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they וְאַנְשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ <S%H582><s%> ve-'an-shei-Hem. they and their men

וַיִּשָּׁבַ֨ע <S%H7650><s%> vai-yish-sha-Va' sware לָהֶ֜ם la-Hem גְּדַלְיָ֨הוּ <S%H1436><s%> ge-dal-Ya-hu And Gedaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אֲחִיקָ֤ם <S%H296><s%> 'a-chi-Kam of Ahikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שָׁפָן֙ <S%H8227><s%> sha-Fan of Shaphan וּלְאַנְשֵׁיהֶ֣ם <S%H376><s%> u-le-'an-shei-Hem their men לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּֽירְא֖וּ <S%H3372><s%> ti-re-'U Fear מֵעֲב֣וֹד <S%H5647><s%> me-'a-Vod not to serve הַכַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <S%H3778><s%> hak-kas-Dim; the Chaldeans שְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> she-Vu dwell in בָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz, the land וְעִבְד֛וּ <S%H5647><s%> ve-'iv-Du and serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon וְיִיטַ֥ב <S%H3190><s%> ve-yi-Tav and it shall be well לָכֶֽם׃ <S%H99999><s%> la-Chem.
